lastOpenFiles: You will never get anywhere if you don't take risk.md
Don't be afraid to take risks.md
The most entertaining outcome is the most likely.md
The fuel for AI is Data.md
The ability to collect and analyze vast flows of real-time  data would be crucial to all forms of AI.md
Trying to placate the gangsters is futile. The more you try, the less they fear or respect you. Hit them hard, or hit anyone hard, and they will respect you.md
If we don't accelerate we're not going to achieve much in our lifetimes.md
Musk's method.md
A small number of exceptional people who are highly motivated can do better than a large number of people who are pretty good and moderately motivated.md
People are way more productive when they are in person.md
Lead by example.md
Don't be afraid of being judged or ridiculed.md
Be wary of anyone whose confidence was greater than their competence.md
Don't separate the engineering team from the designer team. The designer team should feel the immediate pain when their design is hard to engineer.md
Design, engineering and manufacturing teams should be clustered together.md
It's true that if they see the general out on the battlefield, the troops are going to be motivated.md
You got to take risks. You got to love taking risks.md
1 - Raw Notes/Interviews/Let's do things that move our hearts!.md
Stand for freedom of speech and thought.md
1 - Raw Notes/Interviews/Too many regulations will hinder innovation.md
We have to make a way that will ensure our civilization's survival.md
Business exists to help humanity and to preserve civilization.md
You can be more innovative by challenging authority.md
Musk often challenges people with every specific questions.md
Whoever is doing the great work , they get more responsibility.md
Pretend we are a startup about to run out of money. Faster. Faster. Please mark anytime a date has slipped. All bad news should be given loudly and often. Good news can be said quietly and once.md
